posts.caption: developers.slashdot.org
posts.description: An anonymous reader writes: Microsoft today announced plans to open source .NET, the company's software framework that primarily runs on Windows, and release it on GitHub. Furthermore, Microsoft also unveiled plans to take .NET cross-platform by targeting both Mac OS X and Linux. In the next release…

posts.message: Great steps Microsoft. Soon .NET will be on Mac and Linux officially. I think this will attract too much attention to ASP.NET in the web development community
